item.description:
This event is hosted by James Mitchell.
James' invitation to our group members:

"I run the largest high end social group in Boston, Boston Convivium (www.bostonconvivium.com). I am getting some people together for drinks and food on Monday, Jan. 11 at 7:30 p.m. Bristol Lounge in the Four Seasons Hotel. We will meet in the bar. If you cannot find me, ask the attendant or call me at (781) 718-1301. Feel free to bring a friend or two.

7:30 prompt please.

To attend, you need to sign up for Boston Convivium at:

www.bostonconvivium.com/apply/about

After you do, send me an e-mail and I will add you to the invitation list for this event.

If you have already signed up for Boston Convivium and you received an invitation through Socializr, just RSVP through Socializ and you need do nothing else. If you have already signed up for BC but you did not receive an invitation through, send me an email and please include your email address and telephone number.


Thanks!
James Mitchell

jmitchell@kensingtonllc.com
www.jmitchell.me
m: (781) 718-1301"
item.name: Bristol Lounge at the Four Seasons Hotel
